title: PVP Wooden Sword

fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: If there are more than 3 players on a space, 3 are chosen randomly.

desc:
Post 2401
- __Tag: Minecraft__: If there are no cards on the <:builder:1119843481700012103> pile, place Stone (788) in a 3x3 area, bring everyone onto (0,0), and move 1 space.

- Swing your sword and deal 1 HP to players on a space.
- 1 HP of damage corresponds to 1 card drawn.
